title: What time is the Roland Garros final between Sinner & Alcaraz?
description: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz will meet in a heavyweight clash Sunday in the Roland Garros final, the first championship-match showdown in the pair's gripping Lexus ATP Head2Head rivalry. Sinner defeated Djokovic to reach the final at the clay-court major for the first time, while Alcaraz kept his title defence alive with a victory against Lorenzo Musetti. When is the Roland Garros final? The Sinner-Alcaraz final will begin not before 3 p.m. local time in Paris on Sunday. The match for the Coupe des Mousquetaires will be on Court Philippe-Chatrier. Earlier in the day will be the women's doubles final. Read More Rivalries: Alcaraz vs. Sinner Sinner sinks Djokovic to reach first Roland Garros final Alcaraz advances to Roland Garros final after Musetti retires [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Earlier in the day will be the women's doubles final. html:
Roland Garros

Vote in championship poll

June 07, 2025

Julian Finney/Getty Images

The Roland Garros final will be played on Court Philippe-Chatrier in Paris. By ATP Staff

Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz will meet in a heavyweight clash Sunday in the Roland Garros final, the first championship-match showdown in the pair's gripping Lexus ATP Head2Head rivalry.

Sinner defeated Djokovic to reach the final at the clay-court major for the first time, while Alcaraz kept his title defence alive with a victory against Lorenzo Musetti.

When is the Roland Garros final?
The Sinner-Alcaraz final will begin not before 3 p.m. local time in Paris on Sunday. The match for the Coupe des Mousquetaires will be on Court Philippe-Chatrier. Earlier in the day will be the women's doubles final.

Sinner sinks Djokovic to reach first Roland Garros final
Alcaraz advances to Roland Garros final after Musetti retires
